content: this legal document is about a divorce by mutual consent between mr and his wife mrs they are both belgian nationals and got married in new york in 2010 the document explains that they have two minor children and have agreed to settle their mutual rights according to the judicial code they provided a detailed statement of their property and debts and agreed on the division of assets and debts the document also addresses residence custody visitation and financial support for the children mr will be moving to the united states in the future but both parents want to maintain a strong bond with the children they agree to jointly exercise custody and make major decisions together mr will have visitation rights and will contribute financially to the childrens upbringing the agreement also outlines the arrangements for child maintenance payments including a monthly amount to be deposited into a joint account extraordinary expenses will be considered in addition to the regular maintenance payments the document explains the possibility of seeking authorization for owed maintenance payments if the other party fails to pay it also mentions that the costs of the divorce procedure will be split between the parties the document concludes by stating that the agreements made between the spouses will have legal effect in various situations and that the notary has fulfilled their obligations in informing the parties and providing impartial advice
